short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your ally for effortlessly obtaining and managing Microsoft Graph API authentication tokens with just one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AutoGraphToken is a convenient browser extension designed to simplify obtaining and managing authentication tokens for the Microsoft Graph API. 
With this extension, manual token retrieval becomes a thing of the past. 
It automates the process by providing quick and transparent access to the necessary tokens. 
With a single click, AutoGraphToken retrieves the required authentication token and automatically copies it to your clipboard, ready to be used in your API requests. 
Save time and effort while ensuring a seamless interaction with the Microsoft Graph API through AutoGraphToken.
